The Onleihe – the free of charge service of your library now as an app, supports over 2.900 libraries.

With this app you’ll always have your library with you. Browse the collection of your library and lent eBooks and eMagazine on the fly or from your home directly with your smartphone or tablet. You can also lent eAudio and eMusic titles, listen to them via streaming or download them directly onto your device.  Following the same principle as the web-based Onleihe, the lent titles can be consumed free of charge for a certain set amount of time. Afterwards the titles will automatically be returned to the library.

You can search directly throughout the app or browse the collection of your library through different categories and eMagazines. On first sight, you’ll see if a title is available and you can alter your search results with an wide array of different filter or sort options.

The detailed view of a certain title will give you all the information you seek, from the name of the book, the author, to the series name, length and much more. If a title is temporary not available you can also reserve it. As soon as the title is then available for you, you will get an e-mail notification to the address you specified. Your reservations are easily accessible with an overview and you can directly lent the titles if they are available. Should you no longer need an ongoing reservation or if you do need to change the address, you are able to edit or delete your reservations.

At any given time you can access your overview of your lent titles. At the moment you are able to lent, read or listen to eBooks, eMagazines, eAudios and eMusic titles.

summary.label:
The “Little Stories” series is a collection of fairy tales in which your kid plays the main role. It's quite simple – just enter your kid's name and gender into the settings window and enjoy reading fairy tales about your son or daughter.

To make it even cooler, we've added beautiful melodies and wonderful pictures to help you raise your child by giving him or her only positive examples. Moreover, you can also make your own audiobooks! Just spend a few minutes to voice-over the story.

Let love and kindness fill your family’s leisure time to make your life and the world around you happier!

Why “Little Stories”?
• 1800+ pictures
• Gender determines the choice of illustrations
• 45 exciting fairy tales so far and more to come
• Enchanting music accompanies each story
• You can create audiobooks by recording your own voice!
• 1st place in the “Entertainment” category of Rating Runet in 2018!
• 1st place in the “App For Kids” category of Golden App in 2016!
• 3rd place in the “Entertainment” category of Golden App in 2017!

We’d like to tell you more about the process behind creating stories for kids so that you have a better idea about the hard work we put into “Little Stories”.

1) It all begins with searching for an author. He/she can live in any country of the world, but the important thing is that he/she is able to create an interesting and insightful story. Before writing a bedtime story, the author has to read the conditions first. For example, the story may not contain more than 50 scenes (each of which can consist of 146 symbols max.) otherwise the text won’t fit into the app. Once the story has been completed, the next stage can begin.

2) It is now  time to create the storyboard. A storyboard is a selection of simple sketches for each of the illustrations of the story. It gives us a better idea about the visual images of the children’s story.

3) Once the storyboard has been approved, we move on to searching for an illustrator. It should be noted that not all styles might be appropriate for a certain bedtime story and, therefore, it’s important to achieve a perfect fit between the story and the illustration style.

4) Meanwhile, the composer creates the melody. Both the story itself and the artist’s illustrations serve as inspiration for the creation of music. The composer also has conditions to meet: the melody must be soothing and prepare children for a good night’s sleep since most often stories are read for bedtime.

5) What’s more, we also translate our stories for kids into other languages.

6) But that’s not the end! It’s important to see how the book for kids looks inside the app. Line breaks should be checked to make sure the text looks nice and neat. This is done by two professionals: the programmer and the tester.

7) Only after this final step do we release the story for kids. This entire process might take anywhere from two to nine months. So, it’s a hard, but interesting, journey!

We continuously add new fairy tales to our collection! 
Fairy tales are designed for kids aged 3+.

Follow us on: facebook.com/diveomedia

summary.label:
Gottes Wort für jeden Tag
Die Losungen sind ein Weg, Gottes Wort mit dem Alltag zu verbinden. Für jeden Tag des Jahres bieten sie zwei Bibelworte an, dazu einen Liedvers oder ein Gebet aus der christlichen Tradition. 

• Nach der kostenlosen Installation der App erhalten Sie die reduzierte Version der Losungen für das ganze Jahr (Internetverbindung vorausgesetzt). 
• Es wird ein In-App-Kauf von 4,49 € notwendig (Plus-Version), der die kompletten Daten für den jeweiligen Jahrgang nachinstalliert. Darin enthalten sind Losung und Lehrtext sowie der dritte Text, Bibellese und sämtliche Angaben zu den liturgischen Texten der Sonn- und Festtage. Alle Bibelstellen sind verlinkt mit m.die-bibel.de zum Lesen der Texte im Zusammenhang.
• Auf Grund der anfallenden Lizenzgebühren für die dritten Texte ist ein kostenloses Angebot der vollständigen Losungen inkl. Dritttexte als App nicht möglich.
• Sobald der Losungsjahrgang des Folgejahres verfügbar ist, kann der aktuelle Jahrgang als Plus-Version kostenlos verwendet werden. Beispiel: Der Losungsjahrgang 2020 ist ab dem 01.11.2019 erhältlich. Somit erhalten Sie die Plus-Inhalte für die Monate November und Dezember kostenlos.

Die Losungen können ein erster Schritt sein, die Bibel in ihrer ganzen Breite und Tiefe kennen zu lernen.
Die Losungen erscheinen bisher jedes Jahr seit 1731, ohne Unterbrechung, in gedruckter Form. Seither sprechen sie zu ganz unterschiedlichen Menschen, über alle Wechsel der Gesellschaftsordnungen hinweg.

Bookstats ermöglicht es dir, dein Bücherregal virtuell zu verwalten und ausführliche Statistiken zu deinem Leseverhalten zu erhalten.

Wie viele Seiten habe ich dieses Jahr schon gelesen? Wie lange benötige ich durchschnittlich um ein Buch zu lesen? Wie viel Geld habe ich im letzten Monat für Bücher ausgeben? Und wie viele Bücher besitze ich eigentlich insgesamt? Wird mein Stapel ungelesener Bücher kleiner?

Diese und noch viel mehr Fragen beantwortet dir Bookstats – eine App speziell entwickelt für Buchliebhaber. 


▸ Behalte stets den Überblick über deine Bücher
In Bookstats hast du die Möglichkeit, die Bücher in deinem Besitz zu verwalten, kategorisieren und durchsuchen. Versehentliche Doppelkäufe von Büchern gehören somit der Vergangenheit an.

Dein Bücherregal zu Hause platzt schon aus allen Nähten? Kein Problem: Mit dem Barcode-Scanner kannst du die Bücher in Sekundenschnelle zu deinem Regal hinzufügen. Informationen wie der Titel, den Autor, das Cover oder die Seitenzahl werden automatisch vorausgefüllt.

Füge Bücher deiner Wunschliste hinzu, um jederzeit einen Überblick über deine Buchwünsche zu haben. Hast du ein Buch von deiner Wunschliste bekommen? Dann verschiebe es einfach direkt in dein Bücherregal.

▸ Zeige dir Statistiken an
In den Statistiken kannst du dein Leseverhalten ausführlich und anschaulich dargestellt verfolgen. Auch ein Blick in die Vergangenheit ist jederzeit möglich.

▸ Synchronisiere dein Bücherregal auf allen Geräten
Aktiviere die Online-Speicherung deiner Daten, um dein Bücherregal auf all deinen Geräten stets aktuell zu haben. Du kannst diese Funktion auch nutzen, um die Daten auf ein neues Gerät zu übertragen.

Frequently asked questions

How are READ-O recommendations generated?

المصحف الذهبي: هو أحدث تطبيقات القرآن الكريم كاملا (مصحف إلكتروني) التي تم تطويرها لخدمة المستخدم بالاستفادة من التقنيات الحديثة المتوفرة، وهو تطبيق متخصص بعرض وتحميل سور القرآن الكريم واستماعه بصورة تفاعلية ميسرة. يوظف التطبيق البيئة الجديدة على هواتف الآي فون والآيباد مما يتيح للمستخدم التفاعل مع القرآن الكريم بسهولة ويسر مع الاحتفاظ بجماليات المصحف الشريف من خطوط ونقوش دلائل الآيات والسور.


من اهم مميزات التطبيق:


١.التفاعل مع نص القرآن الكريم على مستوى الآية مما يتيح للمستخدم التفاعل مع آيات المصحف من (أسباب النزول، تفسير الآيات، المعنى بالكلمة، استماع، إعراب، بلاغة، صرف، إضافة علامة، معجم الكلمات، فوائد).


٢. يوفر التطبيق تلاوة المصحف بثلاث روايات: حفص عن عاصم، وورش عن نافع، وقالون.


٣. إعراب القرآن الكريم كاملا من كتاب الجدول في إعراب القرآن الكريم.


٤. البلاغة والصرف لآيات القرآن الكريم مع العديد من فوائد الآيات.


٥. ميزة الاختيار بين أكثر من ٦٠ كتاب تفسير للقرآن دون الحاجة لتحميلها. مع إمكانية تحميلها لاستخدامها دون اتصال الانترنت، مع دعم أكثر من ٧٠ ترجمة للمصحف من موقع موسوعة القرآن الكريم الموثوق.


٦. قسم خاص للاستماع لسور القرآن الكريم بصوت أي قارئ، منها ماهر المعيقلي وعبد الباسط، عبد الرحمن السديس وسعود الشريم وإبقاء التشغيل حتى في وضع غير النشط للتطبيق.


٧. ميزة الاستماع للآيات، صفحة كاملة أو حتى السور كاملة بصوت أكثر من ١٠٠ قارئ ويوفر التطبيق العديد من المقرئين ليتمكن المستمع من تنزيل أي من المقرئين عند الحاجة.


٨.إدراج نظام مميز لحفظ مواقع القراءة بحيث يتمكن القارئ من تحديد الصفحة وحفظها للرجوع إليها.


٩.يوفر التطبيق للقارئ إمكانية الرجوع لتفسير أي آية بصورة لحظية من خلال اختيار الآية على صفحات المصحف.


١٠.يعرض التطبيق خلفية الصفحات بألوان جميلة كما يتيح التطبيق للقارئ القراءة الليلية والتي تلون الخلفية باللون الأسود والخطوط البيضاء لتعطي القارئ الراحة التامة عند القراءة في أجواء منخفضة الإضاءة.


١١.ييسر التطبيق خاصية البحث النصي في آيات القرآن الكريم من خلال البحث اللحظي وعرض النتائج مع الصفحات بالإضافة إلى إمكانية الذهاب للصفحة وتظليل خلفية الآية المختارة ليسهل على المستخدم معرفتها.


١٢. يضيف التطبيق إمكانية الحصول على أوقات الصلاة واتجاه القبلة مع إمكانية الحصول على إشعارات بوقت الصلاة من داخل وخارج التطبيق.


١٣. يضيف التطبيق إمكانية إنشاء نُسخ مصاحف متعددة بحيث تحتفظ كل نسخة من المصحف الشريف بخصائصها المستقلة من علامات مرجعية وأخر صفحة تمت الوقوف عليها والاسم الخاص بذلك المصحف.


١٤. يضيف التطبيق خاصية أذكار المسلم بحيث يتمكن المستخدم من قراءة العديد من الاذكار، منها: أذكار الصباح و المساء والعديد غير ذلك، كما وييسر التطبيق قراءة الاذكار بأساليب مختلفة.


١٥. يضيف التطبيق ختمة المصحف بحيث يساعدك التطبيق على إنشاء ختمة أو أكثر للمصحف حسب رغبتك وتنبيهك يوميًا بموعد الختمة حسب الوقت المناسب لك.


كما يوفر التطبيق العديد من المميزات الأخرى التي تساعد على القراءة السهلة والميسرة.

Download this free app to browse the eBook editions – you can also try free taster versions of many eBooks, so you can try before you buy.

These eBooks are a great resource supporting our world famous RYA Training Courses such as those within the trademark RYA Yachtmaster Scheme, the RYA Powerboat Scheme and the RYA Dinghy Sailing & Windsurfing Schemes among others. You will find eBooks of essential and recommended titles along with plenty of further reading and development, whether you’re starting to sail by taking a Competent Crew course, taking things further with a Day Skipper course or taking your RYA Yachtmaster exam – whatever you need, we’ve got it covered!

There are great examples throughout our range of our use of interactive content in areas such as seamanship, boat handling, passage planning, knots and stability but you’ll find something very special in our editions for:
• Collision Regulations – where we've developed over twenty interactive 360° lights and shapes tool to provide readers a more realistic way of viewing how vessels will actually present themselves in a wide variety of contexts, at four different times of day covering both day and night.
• VHF – where we’ve created animated examples of the voice procedures in the RYA VHF Handbook and also linked the content to sample questions to help students pass the RYA SRC exam.
• Navigation – where we’ve developed a special tool to replicate using the tidal curves in the RYA Training Almanacs to help students taking shorebased navigation courses.

Come back to prehistoric times and play with dinosaurs! 

Featuring an original storybook called Dinosaur Dreams your little ones will delight in finding out what dino’s do during the day and dream about at night.  The illustrations are fun and engaging and the interactive storybook is only one fun activity.  With over 50 games and sounds based on the book your little dinosaur lovers will have a blast!  This endearing and educational app was designed by teachers with over 15 years childcare experience, using their philosophy of learning through play.  This dinosaur kids app is full of fun and will help your child explore their creativity and imagination.   

Dinosaur Dreams A Bedtime Story
What do dinosaurs dream about?  In this interactive fun filled storybook your little ones will learn about what dino’s do during the day, and then what they dream about at night.  Like the T-Rex that dreams of being a clown and making the other dinosaurs smile, and the Apatosaurus that dreams of being a police officer, and the Raptor that dreams of being Santa, it’s a cute and fun read for all dinosaur lovers.   

Tap Sounds
Little fingers love to tap, tap, tap, so these sounds will delight and engage all dinosaur fans.  With a Tap Sound for every dinosaur in the storybook your little ones will get to hear tons of different sounds of the dinosaurs when they are dreaming.  When they tap something new will appear on the screen and after 6 taps they will get to hear a sound of everything that appeared!  It’s super engrossing and entertaining as well as enriching for their imaginations.  

Spot the Difference
Now that they have enjoyed the storybook they can play with all the dinosaurs in the Spot the Difference game!  With tons of games they will delight in finding 3 differences with every dino in the book, and then 3 more when they are sleeping, and another 3 differences for when they are dreaming.  It’s a fun puzzle game that will help your little ones cognitive abilities and keep them entertained as they play.

Find the Difference
Another round of fun games that take the pages of the storybook and brings them to life by adding a lot of cute pictures that enhance their dinosaur dreams is the Find the Difference game.  It’s different that spot the difference because they will have to find something on the page that they get a picture of, 3 games for each dinosaur!  It brings the storybook to life in a fun and creative way, and will keep your little ones engaged and also teach them observation skills.  

Counting Game
Again using and adding to the endearing illustrations from the storybook this game will help your little ones learn to count.   They will get shown a picture of what they have to count on the page and when they pick the right number they win and go to the next game.  It’s rewarding and a fun way to learn through play!  

Let your little ones delve into dinosaur fun and let their imaginations and creativity grow with the Dinosaur Games for Kids Puzzles App!

Halten Sie Ihr Smartphone oder Tablet jeweils über die Bilder in Ihrem Buch, die mit einem kleinen Handysymbol versehen sind. Schon öffnet sich von selbst das interaktive Element. 

Entdecken Sie unsere Bücher interaktiv: informative Videos, praktische Tipps, zahlreiche Informationen, und vieles mehr… 

FUNKTIONEN UND HIGHLIGHTS: 
-	Exklusive Zusatzinhalte rund um Kräuter, Heilkunde, Natur, Kosmetik, Nachhaltigkeit, Ernährung und Kochen 
-	Vielfältige Informationen und vertiefendes Wissen
-	Einblicke in die Tätigkeit der Autorinnen und Autoren

HINWEISE: 
-	Sollten die Bilder von der App nicht erkannt werden, stellen Sie bitte sicher, dass das Buch ausreichend beleuchtet ist und verringern sie gegebenenfalls den Abstand zur Kamera.
-	Ihr elektronisches Gerät muss mit dem Internet verbunden sein.

THE NO.1 DESTINATION FOR COMICS, MANGA, WEBTOONS, MANHUA


OVER 1,000 DIVERSE TITLES
Explore hit and niche titles from publishers large and small, alongside independent studio gems and creator-owned comics. Action, romance, comedy, horror, drama, isekai, slice of life, sci-fi, and more, all in one app.

SEAMLESS EXPLORATION
It’s easier than ever to know whether a title is your cup of tea: when browsing between titles, you can seamlessly preview the first several pages of a chapter to check out the artwork and story, without having to download content or even open the viewer. 

PERSONALIZED RECOMMENDATIONS
No need to manually search for new titles to read — we’ll find you stories that you love. Our smart, powerful AI-powered content recommendation engine learns from your reading to suggest titles just for you.

IMMERSIVE VIEWER
Immerse yourself in comics with a viewer that adapts to every type of comic for fuss-free and seamless reading, on any device.

EASY ORGANIZATION
The day of just managing your reading list with just a “Favorites” tab is over! Now, you can add titles to various lists including: Recently Read, Read Later, Subscribed, Liked, Disliked. 

UPDATES & NOTIFICATIONS
Never miss a chapter of your favorite comics. The app keeps track of all your updates, and you’ll get notifications when new chapters are released.

AUTO-SYNC
Have more than one device? As long as you use the same INKR account, your data and reading progress will automatically sync — across all platforms.


DIRECTLY SUPPORT CREATORS
Revenues from INKR Comics are split with content creators and publishers, empowering them to bring you more amazing content.


Welcome to INKR Comics: the first truly international comic platform, made by comic lovers.
